title.rendered: Art Hearts Fashion Unveils Vibrant Designer Lineup for Miami Swim Week 2024

content.rendered:
Miami, FL Brace yourself for an exhilarating fusion of fashion and creativity as Miami Swim Week, Powered By Art Hearts Fashion, sets the stage for an electrifying week of runway showcases, immersive brand experiences, and insightful panel discussions.

Kicking off the festivities, Art Hearts Fashion launches Miami Model Week with a vibrant casting at Strawberry Moon on Sunday, May 26, 2024, from 3-7 pm, followed by another casting at The Dream Hotel on Monday, May 27, 2024, from 11 am-3 pm. Models and guests may register here to participate. Approved guests will receive access to the runway shows later in the week!

The excitement peaks with the Miami Swim Week Kick-Off Party scheduled for Wednesday, May 29, 2024, at 8 pm, hosted at Gabriel South Beachs acclaimed lobby and pool venue Meet Dahlia. The runway extravaganza commences on Thursday, May 30, 2024, with runway shows every following day commencing at 7 pm, extending through Sunday, June 2, 2024, at M2 (1235 Washington Ave, Miami Beach).

A stellar lineup of designers is set to dazzle audiences, including Asola Swim, Beach Berry, BFYNE, Ca Rioca, Diva Boutique, Giannina Azar, Gyv Me Body, Hunk, Lila Nikole, Mala X Sense Of G, Marqueza, Meet Dahlia, Mr. Triple X, Pink Melon Swim, The Black Tape Project, Wilfredo Gerardo, and Xqbuini just to name a few. 

Delve into the vibrant world of sponsorships at M2, where an array of brands awaits with captivating activations from Beachwaver, Billion Dollar Brows, DriaDair Boutique, Empress Gin, Fade Masters of Miami, Japonesque, Miami Chains & Co., Nike Swim, Snatched Plastic Surgery, Saks Fifth Avenue, Smart Water, Thats It Salon, The Makeup Light, Topo Chico, Unite Hair, Yerba Mate and more. Notably, Snatched Plastic Surgery will offer exclusive meet-and-greet consultations with renowned experts Dr. Paul Boulos, Dr. Victoria Karlinsky, Dr. Michael Stefan, and CEO Claudia Borges, along with exciting giveaways and prizes. Snatched Plastic Surgery will also be hosting an invite-only VIP media/influencer brunch at Joia Beach to close out the week on Sunday, June 2, 2024, at noon.

Complementing the brand experiences are two engaging fashion and beauty conversations featuring luminaries from both realms:

On Friday, May 31st, Snatched Plastic Surgery will host an invite-only conversation exploring the symbiotic relationship between body trends and fashion, with Founder & CEO Claudia Borges, renowned plastic surgeon Dr. Paul Boulos, Editor-in-Chief of VOGUE Jose Forteza, swimwear designer Lila Nikole, retail boutique owner and stylist Kendria Godair, and Art Hearts Fashion beauty director April Love at The Gabriel Hotel at 1 PM moderated by Miami Fashion Icon Timur Tugberk. 

On Saturday, June 1st, Fashion Group International South Florida joins forces with Art Hearts Fashion for the global Communiqu presentation, delving into emerging styles and trends in 2024 and beyond, led by Art Hearts Fashion CEO and Founder Erik Rosete at The Gates Hotel starting at 1 PM. 

Join us all week long for exclusive first come, first serve after parties at E11even Miami.

Miami Swim Week Powered By Art Hearts Fashion, promises an unforgettable convergence of style, innovation, and insight, marking a pivotal moment in the fashion landscape. Join us for an extraordinary celebration of creativity and expression.

Non-media consumer tickets are available to enjoy the Art Hearts Fashion Miami Swim Week runway shows in several tiers, each offering unique privileges:

Row 1 Ticket: VIP Seat, Major Swag Bag, Complimentary Beverages, Exclusive invite to VIP private Parties with hosted bar, invites to after parties

Row 2 Ticket: VIP Row 2 Seat, sponsored goodies, VIP Lounge, priority access, invites to after-parties

Row 3 Ticket: VIP Row 3 Seat, priority admission

General Admission: Access to all the fun, runway shows, and drinks available for purchase

Take your chance to be part of the ultimate celebration of swimwear fashion at Miami Swim Week 2024 Powered By Art Hearts Fashion! Join us at one of our partnering hotels The Dream, The Gabriel, or The Gates:

THE DREAM HOTEL - 1111 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139 

Rooms available May 26 - June 3, 2024

KING BEDS ONLY $149 - waived resort fees

Must be booked by May 14th or until the block is sold out.

*This hotel is closest to the runway venue 0.2 miles*

Click HERE to book

GABRIEL SOUTH BEACH - 640 Ocean Drive, Miami Beach, FL 33139

Rooms available May 26 - June 5, 2024

KING BEDS $209 - reduced resort fees of $20 nightly (automatically added to rate)

Must be booked by May 24th or until the block is sold out. 

*This hotel is close to the venue 0.5 miles and an Oceanfront property*

Click HERE to book

THE GATES HOTEL - 2360 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FL 33139

Rooms available May 26 - June 5, 2024

KING BEDS $177 - reduced resort fees of $18 nightly

2 QUEEN BEDS $197 - reduced resort fees of $18 nightly

Must be booked by May 24th or until the block is sold out. 

*This hotel is furthest from the venue but still under a mile*

Click HERE to book

About Art Hearts Fashion

Art Hearts Fashion is the leading platform dedicated to bringing innovative designers and artists to the forefront of fashion week. Our coast-to-coast contemporary events get the most renowned designers and the sharpest up-and-coming emerging designers to the runway in New York, Los Angeles, Miami, and beyond. Founded in 2010, AHF has become a driving force for fashion, art, and entertainment. The shows have featured designers including Nicole Miller, Carmen Steffens, Hale Bob, Michael Costello, Trina Turk, Orlebar Brown, Patbo, Onia, Furne Amato, Walter Mendez, Vilebrequin, Jovani, Cotton INC, Black Tape Project, Mr. Triple X, and Michael NGO.
